page.title: 04Attitudes.
page.content: This is a time of great change for our area. The majority of large metal working firms, many of which had been in existence since the 19C, have closed and they have been replaced by new industry only to a limited extent. The motorway built close by makes this a good centre for distrubution so GKN fasteners, GKN steelstock, and Tandy electrical have their national distribution HQ in our block. Unemployment, however, is very high and when people were asked about the situation in our block in 1985 this was what they spoke of most. Some older people said the unemployment was worse than the 1930's particularly for young people. Many people said they were worried about the future and they thought that lots of people would have to move away from the Wednesbury, Darlaston, Tipton area.
